content.question: Based on the data presented in the graph, which of the following statements is accurate?

choices.label: Traditional talk therapy appears to be the most effective treatment for anxiety conditions overall.
Medication was the most effective strategy in working with phobias.
Cognitive-behavioral therapy showed the greatest success in working with phobias and panic conditions.
Treatment is most effective for anxiety conditions when all three interventions are used.

content.answer: Cognitive-behavioral therapy showed the greatest success in working with phobias and panic conditions.
